title: Trying to find this awful font!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172147im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6003.jpg)

I'm looking to replicate an old brochure and I can't find this font - can any of you experts help me?

Thanks in advance!  
Dave

Font: 

 bauhaus light
